TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BYOT extends System.Object

summary.span: 包裝 COM+ 類別，以及 COM+ DTC 介面 和 。

span.span: Wraps the COM+ class and the COM+ DTC interfaces and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks （攜帶您自己的交易） 可讓元件，以建立或繼承外部交易。 (Bring Your Own Transaction) allows a component to be created with or to inherit an external transaction. 也就是一種元件，還沒有相關聯的交易可以取得交易。That is, a component that does not already have an associated transaction can acquire a transaction. COM + 允許將任意的既有分散式交易協調器 (DTC) 或 Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) 交易設定為新的元件內容中的交易屬性。COM+ allows setting an arbitrary pre-existing Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) or Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) transaction as the transaction property of a new component's context. 這可讓的交易由交易處理 (TP) 監視、 物件/工作選取器 (OTS) 或資料庫管理系統 (DBMS) 所控制其存留期與相關聯的 COM + 元件。This allows COM+ components to be associated with transactions whose lifetimes are controlled by a transaction processing (TP) monitor, Object/Task Selector (OTS), or database management system (DBMS). 交易必須謹慎使用。 transactions must be used with caution. 在某些情況下，它們可能會造成交易跨越多個同步處理網域中 — 也就是可平行處理原則與另一個交易，造成鎖死情況。In certain situations, they can result in a transaction spanning multiple synchronization domains—that is, they allow parallelism with another transaction, causing a deadlock condition. 自動交易，而非交易，是對於商務元件的慣用的程式設計模型。Automatic transactions, rather than transactions, are the preferred programming model for writers of business components.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateWithTipTransaction (string url, Type t);
.method public static hidebysig object CreateWithTipTransaction(string url, class System.Type t) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateWithTipTransaction (url As String, t As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateWithTipTransaction(System::String ^ url, Type ^ t);

span.span: A TIP URL that specifies a transaction.

summary.span: 使用 Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP) 來建立登記於手動交易內的物件。

span.span: Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction using the Transaction Internet Protocol (TIP).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行 DTC COM + 方法的 managed 的對應`ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`。 performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ DTC method `ICreateWithTIPTransaction::CreateInstance`.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object CreateWithTransaction (object transaction, Type t);
.method public static hidebysig object CreateWithTransaction(object transaction, class System.Type t) cil managed
Public Shared Function CreateWithTransaction (transaction As Object, t As Type) As Object
public: static System::Object ^ CreateWithTransaction(System::Object ^ transaction, Type ^ t);

param.name: transaction
param.span: 指定交易的 或 物件。

span.span: The or object that specifies a transaction.

summary.span: 建立登記於手動交易內的物件。

span.span: Creates an object that is enlisted within a manual transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行 COM + Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) 方法的 managed 的對應`ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`。 performs the managed equivalent of the COM+ Distributed Transaction Coordinator (DTC) method `ICreateWithTransaction::CreateInstance`.
